^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Reset.longDescription: This defines the name of the custom action supported on this resource.
Reset.description: This action is used to reset this switch.

ConnectedSwitchPorts.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resources that this port is associated with and shall reference a resource of type Port.
ConnectedSwitchPorts.description: An array of references to the ports that connect to the switch through this port.

AssociatedEndpoints.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resources that this port is associated with and shall reference a resource of type Endpoint.
AssociatedEndpoints.description: An array of references to the endpoints that connect to the switch through this port.

Oem.longDescription: This object represents the Oem property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.

ConnectedSwitches.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resources that this port is associated with and shall reference a resource of type Switch.
ConnectedSwitches.description: An array of references to the switches that connect to the switch through this port.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Links.longDescription: The Links property, as described by the Redfish Specification, shall contain references to resources that are related to, but not contained by (subordinate to), this resource.
Links.description: Contains references to other resources that are related to this resource.

PortProtocol.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain the protocol being sent over this port.
PortProtocol.description: The protocol being sent over this port.

Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.
Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.

MaxSpeedGbps.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the maximum speed of which this port is capable of being configured.  If capable of auto-negotiation, the system shall attempt to negotiate at the maximum speed set.
MaxSpeedGbps.description: The maximum speed of this port as currently configured.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.
Oem.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.
Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.

CurrentSpeedGbps.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the speed of this port currently negotiated and running.
CurrentSpeedGbps.description: The current speed of this port.

Width.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the number of physical transport links that this port contains.
Width.description: The number of lanes, phys, or other physical transport links that this port contains.

PortId.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the name of the switch port as indicated on the outside of the switch.
PortId.description: This is the label of this port on the physical switch package.

PortType.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the port type for this port.
PortType.description: This is the type of this port.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Port.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a simple switch port for a Redfish implementation.
Port.description: Port contains properties describing a port of a switch.

enumDescriptions.InterswitchPort: This port connects to another switch.
enumDescriptions.BidirectionalPort: This port connects to any type of device.
enumDescriptions.UnconfiguredPort: This port has not yet been configured.
enumDescriptions.UpstreamPort: This port connects to a host device.
enumDescriptions.DownstreamPort: This port connects to a target device.
enumDescriptions.ManagementPort: This port connects to a switch manager.

title: #Port.v1_0_2.Port
